scripts.lint: npm run lint:tslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:prettier: prettier --check ./app/**/*.{js,ts,ymljson} || (echo 'Run `npm run fix:prettier` to fix it.' && exit 1)
scripts.copyencompass: shx mkdir ./build/encompass-ecs && shx mv ./build/node_modules/encompass-ecs/encompass-ecs/init.lua ./build/encompass-ecs/init.lua && shx cp ./node_modules/encompass-ecs/encompass-ecs.lua ./build
scripts.copytslibs: npm run copyencompass && npm run copytstlgc && npm run copyjprof
